title: What...Why...How To Do: Karma Yoga Simplified
description: We are often confronted with questions like 'Who am I?' 'What should I do?' 'Why should I do it?' How should I do it?' When we have no clue to all such questions, we feel depressed. The present book, 'What.. Why.. How.. To Do' is about us. Based on the teachings of the Bhagavad Gita, it addresses core issues that would be relevant, always. It is not a spiritual book, but a book about life and the lifestyle.
author: Ranjan Kumar  Singh
